values.Name: Arrival, completed
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has arrived.

values.Name: Loading, authorized
values.Description: Authorisation to load has been given.

values.Name: Arrival, in defective condition
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment or a means of transport has arrived in a defective condition.

values.Name: Defective equipment returned to service
values.Description: The equipment previously the subject of a 'defective condition' status has been returned to service.

values.Name: Process, begun
values.Description: The process has begun.

values.Name: Booking, completed
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment or means of transport has been booked.

values.Name: Booking, cancelled
values.Description: The booking of goods/consignment/equipment or means of transport has been cancelled.

values.Name: Cleared, import restrictions
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport held for import restriction purposes, has been released for import.

values.Name: Cleared, export restrictions
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport held for export restriction purposes, has been released for export.

values.Name: Cleared, by agriculture, food or fisheries authorities
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has been cleared by agriculture, food or fisheries authorities.

values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has been cleared by port authority.

values.Name: Cleared, by customs
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has been cleared by customs.

values.Name: Collection/pick-up, completed
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment has been collected/picked-up.

values.Name: Process, completed
values.Description: The process has been completed.

values.Name: Consolidated
values.Description: The goods/consignments have been consolidated.

values.Name: Crossed border
values.Description: The goods/consignments/equipment/means of transport has crossed a border.

values.Name: Customs clearance, refused

values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment has been damaged in the course of transportation.

values.Name: Delayed, in the course of transportation

values.Name: Delivery, completed

values.Description: Delivery of the goods/consignment/equipment has been completed as per instruction.

values.Name: Delivery, not completed

values.Name: Departure, delayed
values.Description: The means of transport has been delayed in departure.

values.Name: Deramped

values.Description: The equipment has been returned from repair.

values.Name: Equipment, sent for repair
values.Description: The equipment has been sent for repair.

values.Name: Equipment, repaired
values.Description: The equipment has been repaired.

values.Name: Not found

values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has been found.

values.Name: Freight paid

values.Name: Released from bond
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment has been released from bond.

values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment has arrived at the port.

values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment has been returned by the recipient.

values.Name: Delayed, at origin
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has been delayed at the origin.

values.Name: Held, by logistic service provider
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment has been held by the logistic service provider.

values.Name: Incident occurred but accepted by ordering party
values.Description: An incident has occurred but has been accepted by the ordering party.

values.Name: Delivery party' premises closed during normal hours
values.Description: The premises of the delivery party were closed during normal hours.

values.Name: Delivery incomplete, time shortage
values.Description: The delivery of the goods/consignment/equipment could not be completed due to a shortage of time to handle the delivery.

values.Name: Despatch, preparation error
values.Description: An error occurred during the preparation of the despatch.

values.Name: Undefined incident attributed to logistic server provider
values.Description: An undefined incident has occurred which has been attributed to the logistic service provider.

values.Name: Instruction to despatch, received
values.Description: The instruction to despatch has been received.

values.Name: Despatch, under preparation
values.Description: The despatch of the goods/consignment/equipment is in preparation.

values.Name: Return in progress
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment is being returned.

values.Name: Instruction to despatch, cancelled
values.Description: The instruction to despatch has been cancelled.

values.Name: Delivery refused, by recipient
values.Description: The delivery of the goods/consignment/equipment has been refused by the recipient.

values.Name: Goods, held by third party on instruction from owner
values.Description: Goods are held under control of a third party following an instruction from the owner of the goods.

values.Name: Weight or volume loss
values.Description: The goods have suffered a weight or volume loss.

values.Name: Moved, internally
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment has been moved internally.

values.Name: Consignment partially stolen
values.Description: The consignment has been partially stolen.

values.Name: Consignment partially lost or missing
values.Description: The consignment is partially lost or missing.

values.Name: Destroyed
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment has been destroyed.

values.Name: Action by logistics service provider
values.Description: An action was taken by the logistics service provider.

values.Name: Action by logistics service provider on instruction by owner
values.Description: An action was taken by the logistics service provider as instructed by owner of the goods.

values.Name: Document, refused
values.Description: The document has been refused.

values.Name: Seals, damaged
values.Description: The seals on the equipment have been damaged.

values.Name: Seals, broken
values.Description: The seals on the equipment have been broken.

values.Name: Seals, tampered
values.Description: The seals on the equipment have been tampered.

values.Name: Collection/pick-up, business closed
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment could not be collected/picked-up as the business was closed.

values.Name: Collection/pick-up, changed schedule
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment cannot be collected/picked-up at the arranged time because of a change of schedule.

values.Name: Collection/pick-up, further address needed
values.Description: A further address is needed to effect collection/pick-up of the goods/consignment/ equipment.

values.Name: Collection/pick-up, industrial dispute
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment cannot be collected/picked-up due to an industrial dispute.

values.Name: Collection/pick-up, equipment failure
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment cannot be collected/picked-up due to a failure in the equipment.

values.Name: Document, incorrect
values.Description: The document for the goods/consignments/equipment is incorrect.

values.Name: Collection/pick-up, scheduled past cut-off time
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment to be collected/picked-up has been scheduled past the cut-off time.

values.Name: Collection/pick-up, adverse weather conditions
values.Description: Adverse weather conditions have affected collection/pick-up.

values.Name: Unloading, completed from a means of transport
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment has been unloaded from a means of transport.

values.Name: Deliverable
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment can be delivered.

values.Name: Not deliverable
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment cannot be delivered.

values.Name: Handed over
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment has been handed over to another party.

values.Name: Signature required
values.Description: A signature is required.

values.Name: Defined incident attributed to logistic server provider
values.Description: A defined incident has occurred which has been attributed to the logistic service provider.

values.Name: Delivery not completed, business closed, inventory count
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment could not be delivered as the business was closed due to inventory count.

values.Name: Delivery not completed, business closed on Saturday
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment could not be delivered as the business was closed on Saturday.

values.Name: Delivery not completed, business closed on national holiday
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment could not be delivered as the business was closed on a national holiday.

values.Name: En route, via local route
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport is moving to destination via a local route.

values.Name: En route, via national route
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport is moving to destination via a national route.

values.Name: En route, via international route
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport is moving to destination via an international route.

values.Name: Transport terminated, mail not received
values.Description: The transport of the goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has been terminated and the mail has not been received.

values.Name: Bill of Lading issued
values.Description: The Bill of Lading for the goods/consignment/equipment has been issued.

values.Name: Cleared, by logistics service provider
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has been cleared by logistics service provider.

values.Name: Delivery, expected
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment expected to be delivered.

values.Name: Measured
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has been measured.

values.Name: Loading, ready
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment is ready to be loaded onto a means of transport.

values.Name: Arrival, at yard
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has arrived at the yard.

values.Name: Departure, from yard
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has departed from the yard.

values.Name: Accepted at interchange point
values.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has been accepted at the interchange point.

values.Name: Alerted, no action taken
values.Description: No action taken after an alert in relation to the goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport.

values.Name: Transshipment to another wagon
values.Description: The goods/consignment has been transhipped to another wagon.

values.Name: Trip plan revised manually
values.Description: The transport route has been re-programmed manually.

values.Name: Special wagon handling arranged
values.Description: The handling of a special wagon has been arranged.

values.Name: Equipment, emptied
values.Description: The equipment has been emptied.

values.Name: Equipment, loaded
values.Description: The equipment has been loaded.

values.Name: Equipment, held by transport operator
values.Description: The equipment has been held by the transport operator.

values.Name: Equipment, held by terminal operator
values.Description: The equipment has been held by the terminal operator.

values.Name: Equipment, storage period at terminal exceeded
values.Description: The equipment storage period at a transport terminal has been exceeded.

values.Name: Equipment, held by equipment operator
values.Description: The equipment has been held by the equipment operator.

values.Name: Equipment, not released by equipment operator
values.Description: The equipment has not been released by the equipment operator.

values.Name: Delivery Order Issued
values.Description: Delivery Order for the goods/consignment/equipment/means has been issued.

values.Name: Cleared for container release
values.Description: The procedures of containers’ release from container yard have been cleared by all authorities and private sectors.

values.Description: New code #380 description.
